title: 131. Do You Really Want to Know Your Future?
description: You might think that someone with a 50-50 chance of getting a fatal disease would want to know for sure -- but you would be wrong. What does this say about our supposed thirst for certainty?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
